group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:The Stamp Rally stamped along,@one push at a time.]@[textBlack:Behind their smiles,@as sparks crackle and bloom,]@[textBlack:the Magical Girls continue@to wage their hidden war.]
[textBlack:What blooms before those flowers dissipate]@[textBlack:is nothing else but the@Automatic Purification System.]
[textBlack:Like magma, it rumbles and cools.]@[textBlack:At the center of this heated time,]@[textBlack:It blooms and extinguishes,@over and over again...]
[textBlack:Miss Kureha is the first to get burned.]@[textBlack:Iroha and the others find the stone's location,]@[textBlack:blood boils and heads cool.]

group_1.textCenter: <You can't just watch Iroha and her friends...>
Because I have to write a record@that describes all Magical Girls.
I can't just keep watching only one person...
I'll have to try and follow@Miss Kureha and her allies...
